item.description:
It's been a really long time since I've hosted and this is likely the last opportunity I have til next year so let's play board games!

Euro/strategy board & card games, I have a decent collection (see user JeffyJeff on BGG) but not many of the newer titles from the last couple years (trying to be good).

I'll provide some snacks, coffee & tea, but if you want beer/wine/soda please byob. Â If folks want to eat more I've got lots of canned Progresso soups and there are several places nearby that will deliver.

Do note that I am fostering felines so if you are allergic...

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: All day Euro/Strategy Gaming at Jeff's
